reviewText:
This DVD transports you into the life and landscapes of two special Cornell University natural areas. Steeped in historical significance as outdoor classrooms at Cornell, both are home to an astonishing array of plants and animals.

Each selection is approximately 12 minutes long and will take you through the natural beauty throughout the seasons in Sapsucker Woods, the home of the Cornell Lab of Ornithology and the Mundy Wildflower Gardens at the Cornell Plantations!

A must for anyone that appreciates the beauty and serenity of nature
